brief.picture: Fetch a random fun or cute image.
brief.mock: Mock a user’s message in a sarcastic tone.
brief.ask: Ask Kelly anything — she’ll reply instantly!
brief.heck: Playfully heck someone and get details in your dm.
brief.github: Search for GitHub users or repositories.
brief.yt: Search for YouTube videos and channels.
brief.code: Run or preview code snippets directly.
brief.insta: Search for Instagram profiles and posts.
brief.mute_from_kelly: Mute a member from talking to Kelly.
brief.mute: Mute a member from voice or text chat.
brief.unmute_from_kelly: Unmute someone muted from Kelly chatting.
brief.unmute: Unmute a previously muted from server.
brief.kick: Kick a member out of the server.
brief.warn: Send a formal warning to a user.
brief.ban: Ban a user from the server.
brief.ban_from_kelly: Ban someone from talking to Kelly
brief.assignrole: Assign a specific role to a member.
brief.removerole: Remove a role from a member
brief.deafen: Deafen a user in voice chat.
brief.undeafen: Remove deafen status from a user.
brief.slowmode: Enable slowmode in the current channel.
brief.purge: Bulk delete messages from a channel.
brief.lock: Lock a channel to stop chatting.
brief.set_rank_channel: Set the channel for rank updates.
brief.set_welcome_channel: Set the channel for welcome messages.
brief.set_social_channel: Set the channel for social media updates.
brief.rank_reward: Set rewards to recive on reaching a level
brief.play: Play any song or audio from YouTube or Spotify.
brief.stop: Stop the music and clear the queue.
brief.now_playing: Shows the current playing track and Media player
brief.lyrics: Shows lyrics for currently playing track
brief.rank: Check your level, XP, and rank in the server.
brief.top: View the top-ranked members on the leaderboard.
brief.invite: Get Kelly’s invite link or server invite.
brief.vote: Vote for Kelly and earn rewards.
brief.afk: Set an AFK (away from keyboard) status.
brief.avatar: Show your or someone else’s profile picture.
brief.bug: Report bugs, queries, suggestions using this
brief.help: Show a list of available commands.
brief.activate: Activate Kelly’s advanced features for your server.
brief.gems: Check your gem or rare currency count.
brief.give: Transfer cash or items to another player.
brief.use: Use an item from your inventory.
brief.kill: Challenge and attack another player (for fun).
brief.adventure: Go on an adventure and earn rewards.
brief.craft: Craft new items from your materials.
brief.bankrob: Attempt to rob the bank — risky but rewarding!
brief.beg: Beg for a small random amount of cash.
brief.hunt: Go hunting to earn loot or XP.
brief.buy: Purchase an item from the shop.
brief.sell: Sell an item from your inventory.
brief.market: Black Market the place to sell anything
brief.work: Work at your job for salary
brief.trade: Trade your items for something more valueable
